text:
@KimKardashian @BlessinBackpack Translated from bullshit:
"I'm using your empathy for the families affected by COVID-19 in order to manipulate you into buying my fragrance so that you can help them, but I actually get 4 times ammount these families get for each sale. I'm so generous"
